content.rendered:
CLASSIC SHAPE: 

Rise & Shine’s Kids pillows are the traditional shape smaller size pillows, which will help the child sleep better.

 

MEMORY COMFORT® FOAM: 

Made up of imported materials these memory foam pillows bring you the most comfortable sleep. As the name suggests Memory foam has the ability to remember the original shape, it slowly returns back to it after being compressed. The pillow is made up of 100% pure Visco-Elastic memory foam.

 

TEMPERATURE SENSITIVE MATERIAL: 

It allows our body heat to activate the molding process so that it gives us personalized fit. The climate control features also does not allow the pillow to become hard in winters.

 

SPECIAL FEATURES:

  • Neck & Shoulder pain relief
  • Greater air flow & Refreshing Sleep
  • Relief from Sleep problems
  • Retains original shape after each use, Unlike Polyfill/Cotton pillows our pillows will not sag.
  • Invented by “NASA”
  • Total Value for Money

 

INNER COVER: 

We provide our pillows with two layers of jersey. The basic being a soft material to protect the pillow.

 

PREMIUM SOFT OUTER COVER: 

We provide a Premium fabric as our Outer Cover for the Pillows. It is Antiallergenic, eco-friendly and Easy to Care. Do not hand wash or use machine, only Spot clean by hand with warm water and mild detergent.

 

WE ASSURE: 

Our Pillows are made up of 100% filler-free foam. We have tested our pillows in lab and have a strict quality check before it is dispatched. Our pillows are of high density foam so be assured that it will be your companion for long. We provide One year limited warranty. Please check our Warranty section.

 

Our Pillows will be tightly rolled packed, kindly cut the plastic carefully and then enjoy your pillow coming back to its original shape within 24-48 Hours. Memory Foam pillows may contain air bubbles which may seem as if foam has holes but they are part of moulded foam and they do not affect the quality of the pillow.

excerpt.rendered: Rise & Shine’s Memory Foam Kids Pillow is one of the most luxurious Kids Pillow. Specially designed for Children these pillows are sized such a way that the child can sleep for full night without disturbing their parents. Studies have shown that kids who regularly get an adequate amount of sleep have improved attention, behaviour, learning, memory, and overall mental and physical health.
